# Unicode Math Symbols {#sec-unicode}

## Examples

``` text
Area = 25 m²  
Volume = 3.2 m³  
Density of water = 1000 kg/m³
Angle = 45°  
Angular speed = 12 s⁻¹
Law of sines:
T1 / sin(θ1) = T2 / sin(θ2) = W / sin(θ3)
Law of cosines:
cos(θ_p) = (J² + T² - P²) / (2·J·T)
```

## Kinematics & Dynamics

| Symbol  | Meaning                  |
|---------|--------------------------|
| x, y, z | Position coordinates     |
| r       | Position vector / radius |
| v       | Velocity                 |
| a       | Acceleration             |
| ω       | Angular velocity         |
| α       | Angular acceleration     |
| θ       | Angular position         |
| t       | Time                     |

## Forces, Moments & Energy

| Symbol | Meaning          |
|--------|------------------|
| F      | Force            |
| M      | Moment           |
| T      | Torque           |
| W      | Work             |
| U      | Strain energy    |
| P      | Power            |
| L      | Angular momentum |
| p      | Linear momentum  |

## Fluids

| Symbol | Meaning                    |
|--------|----------------------------|
| ρ      | Density                    |
| μ      | Dynamic viscosity          |
| ν      | Kinematic viscosity        |
| p      | Pressure                   |
| h      | Head                       |
| Q      | Volumetric flow rate       |
| A      | Cross-sectional area       |
| v      | Flow velocity              |
| g      | Gravitational acceleration |

## Stress & Material Properties

| Symbol | Meaning         |
|--------|-----------------|
| σ      | Normal stress   |
| τ      | Shear stress    |
| ε      | Normal strain   |
| γ      | Shear strain    |
| E      | Young’s modulus |
| G      | Shear modulus   |
| ν      | Poisson’s ratio |

## Math Symbols

| Symbol | Name             | Unicode | Typical use          |
|--------|------------------|---------|----------------------|
| √      | Square root      | U+221A  | Roots                |
| ∑      | Summation        | U+2211  | Series               |
| ∫      | Integral         | U+222B  | Calculus             |
| ∞      | Infinity         | U+221E  | Limits               |
| ≤      | Less or equal    | U+2264  | Inequalities         |
| ≥      | Greater or equal | U+2265  | Inequalities         |
| ≠      | Not equal        | U+2260  | Constraints          |
| →      | Right arrow      | U+2192  | Mappings             |
| ⟂      | Perpendicular    | U+27C2  | Geometry             |
| ⌀      | Diameter         | U+2300  | Engineering drawings |
